products.title: DOCK DEMON RED 1PC
products.description: The DOCK DEMON SPINNING ROD & REEL RED 30 inch Combo features many elements including Medium, rod power, fishing species and model. There's a lot to like about this small but mighty rod and reel Combo.

products.title: Ugly Stik 7 Catfish Spinning Fishing Rod and Reel Catfish Combo
products.description: UGLY STIK 7 CATFISH FISHING ROD AND REEL CATFISH COMBO: Durable, dependable Ugly Stik capability, kitted out with an oversized handle knob for fighting big cats.

products.title: Abu Garcia Black Max Fishing Rod and Reel Baitcast Combo
products.description: The upgraded Black Max low profile baitcast combo is engineered with class-leading performance in a compact, lightweight design. A graphite frame and body, along with the compact bent handle and drag star, provide a more ergonomic feel for all-day fishing sessions.

products.title: Shakespeare Conquest Crappie Spinning Reel and Fishing Rod Combo
products.description: Get ready to fish with this Shakespeare Conquest Spinning Combo. It features a 6 foot 6 inch two-piece medium-action rod and has a comfortable split-grip cork handle. The reel and rod Combo has a cold-forged aluminum-ported spool for added durability and strength as well as a lightweight feel.
